title: Quest 3 Just Got 4 HUGE Features I Have Been Waiting For!
description:
Thanks to Squarespace for sponsoring this video! Head to https://squarespace.com/thrillseeker to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain using code thrillseeker at checkout.


Hello and welcome to TUESDAY NEWSDAY! Your number one resource for the entire week's worth of VR news! This week the Quest 3 receives 4 things that I have been WAITING for. Depth API, Inside out Body tracking, generative legs, Xbox Cloud connect, and of course! ASGARDS WRATH! We also get a sneak peak into Mirror Lake, Meta's newest prototype headset design.. and Pico, Meta's biggest competition leaves the race. I hope you enjoy!

You can find the APK for Depth API on my discord- It's also where you can join in my Christmas Meetup!

https://discord.com/invite/thrill

VRChat group for the Meetup:

https://vrc.group/THPH.1498

I hope you have an amazing holiday! Spend time with friends and family and enjoy some good food! Much love everyone!

TIMESTAMPS:

00:00 Intro
00:49 Squarespace
01:27 Mirror
